title: Drawing, "Oak Leaf Pattern, Textile Design", 1950–70
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined.
description: On white background, a pattern of leaves and small blossoms in black, accented in white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Oak Leaf Pattern, Textile Design", 1950–70.
1950–70. Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined.. Gift of Mr. Donald Cameron. 1992-51-13.
